item.title: I Love The Leaderâ€™s Controversial Design In Captain America: Brave New World Even More After This New MCU Theory
item.description: A new MCU theory perfectly explains why Marvel chose to not make the Leader's design comic-accurate in Brave New World, and it's so much better.

item.title: Godzilla & Kong Finally Have Worthy Competition After The Monsterverse's $2.5 Billion Success
item.description: The Monsterverse has proved a highly successful franchise as one of a singular kind, yet Godzilla and Kong may finally have a worthy competitor.

item.title: Looking Back, The Guardians Of The Galaxy Would've Easily Won The Avengers' Fist Movie Fights For 2 Big Reasons
item.description: Marvel has basically confirmed the Guardians of the Galaxy could have won the first Avengers movie, and I thought that was clear for a few reasons.
